price: and to warn those who say, “Allah has begotten a son[3].”
arabic: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗا
footnotes: [3] Such as the Jews and Christians, and the Arab pagans who claimed that angels are Allah’s daughters.
